🍇 Introducing Grappel: Elevate Your Discord Content Sharing!

Grappel🍇 revolutionizes content sharing on Discord from chromium-based browsers like Chrome, Opera, Brave, and Edge, leveraging Manifest V3 for enhanced security.

Key Features:

🖼️ Share Images: Effortlessly send images directly (gif, jpeg, png, tiff...)
🌐 Share Online Images: Share images from the internet (from platforms like Reddit, Twitter)
🔗 Send Links: Instantly share URLs by right-clicking an empty space on any page.
📝 Share Text: Send selected text snippets from your browser (including support for pdf files).

Unique Aspects:
• Multiple Webhooks: Store up to 3 webhooks with 'pair names' for easy identification.
• Delete Tokens: Easily remove pairs by clicking the recycle bin icon 🗑️.
• Recoverable Tokens: Accidentally deleted tokens can be retrieved with ease ♻️.
• Shared Bot Usage: Collaboratively use the same extension within a discord server 👤 
for seamless sharing experiences.

Upgrade your Discord content sharing capabilities with Grappel🍇 today!
